title: 2024 simplified income tax table (Article 189) - raw data from XLSX
notes: Rows cover 770 to 10,000 (thousand won) inclusive at 5-thousand steps, plus exact 10,000 row.
Ranges above 10,000 thousand won use formula rules from the source sheet and are not expanded here.

formula_ranges_thousand.note: (tax at 10,000,000 won) + 35% of (amount over 10,000,000 won * 98%) + 25,000 won
(tax at 10,000,000 won) + 7,394,600 won + 40% of (amount over 30,000,000 won)
(tax at 10,000,000 won) + 13,394,600 won + 42% of (amount over 45,000,000 won)
(tax at 10,000,000 won) + 31,034,600 won + 45% of (amount over 87,000,000 won)
